tool_description: Verifies premium payment status and identifies any payment gaps that could affect coverage validity on the claim date.

policy_number.description: The insurance policy number to check payments for

grace_period_days.description: Number of grace period days for late payments

error_messages: Policy not found: Policy number does not exist in payment records. Verify policy number accuracy.
Invalid claim date: Claim date must be in ISO 8601 format and cannot be in the future.
Payment records unavailable: Unable to retrieve payment history. Contact billing department.
Grace period invalid: Grace period must be between 0 and 90 days.
usage: Input policy_number and claim_date to verify premium payments were current on the claim date. Optionally adjust grace_period_days. Returns payment status and any coverage gaps.

payment_current.description: Whether premiums were current on claim date

coverage_gap_days.description: Number of days coverage was lapsed, if any
